top_comments.comment: Dear Emily, I enjoyed the Charlotte Tilbury so much and know this one will be just as great. Good morning Violetta hope you have a great day, a fellow makeup junkie too.
Emily, I now know why you adore It Cosmetics Super Hero mascara!! It needed to dry out after I bought it but now....it's amazing!! Thank you for the recommendation!! 🙌

I can’t wait to see you use that other cover girl palette! It looks so pretty! I want to get it, but really want to hear your thoughts first 😉😉 as always, watching your videos is like a warm Emily hug. You always give me a sweet start to my day. P.s. loved seeing your family dressed up for Halloween. I miss the days when my kiddos went trick or treating. But now that I’m a Grammy, I’ll get to see my grandson trick or treat. Can’t wait for that! Big hugs, Brenda

I recently purchased CG's Clean foundation and powder. I still love the way they smell, and I thought it felt light, and looked great on my skin with a moisturizing primer. Natural, but evened out with a bit of coverage.
Omg Covergirl Clean liquid foundation takes me BACK!
